author: gjm
msg: installer: adding a script that creates initial configuration as a potential replacement for installer.py to give more flexibility - towards #126

author: stsp
msg: Cosmetic tweaks for the interactive merge tool side-by-side display.
directly, rather than an intermediate local variable.
Fix an off-by-one bug that prevented us from properly chopping newlines
off lines that contain only a newline.
(SEP_STRING): Adjust length of each segment to actual line display length.
(merge_chunks): Stop displaying extra blanks to use as much screen estate

author: mehdi
msg: Changed the base URI of the FOP factory to be the FO file when CLI is used
